author: Matthew F
title: By far the best hotel I've ever stayed in.
text: This hotel is situated in the centre of Paris. Our room was beautifully decorated and you could see the Eiffel Tower from the balcony. The staff were by far the most welcoming and hospitable people I have encountered at any hotel I've visited and really make it feel like they are providing you with more than a script or by the book service. They are very easy to talk to and make you feel as comfortable as possible. This is a perfect hotel for anyone looking for a break, from families to couples looking for a romantic getaway. This is the hotel for you. I think that four stars is unlucky for such a prestige hotel as it provides everything you need for a excellent stay. The staff go above and beyond to make their customers happy and I can whole heartedly say that I will definitely be visiting this hotel again. Thank you to all staff at Hotel Powers, you are a credit to your company.
